node.title: Father Abraham: Stranger and Pilgrim
node.description:
The most prolific author of the New Testament, the Apostle Paul, names Abraham as the “Father of all those who believe.” Undoubtedly this is referring to spiritual lineage, with his spiritual descendants reflecting his character and life choices.

 

And what an amazing legacy Abraham left! His willingness to go where God led, and be what God asked him to be stands as a challenge for the faithful in our day. Will we also be strangers and pilgrims?
